scripts.build:sass:development: yarn lint:sass && yarn node-sass $INIT_CWD/includes/css/scss/development.scss --output $INIT_CWD/includes/css/ --source-map-embed --source-map-contents && yarn run prefix:sass
scripts.build:sass:production: yarn node-sass $INIT_CWD/includes/css/scss/production.scss --output $INIT_CWD/includes/css/ && yarn run prefix:sass:production && yarn minify:sass
scripts.watch:sass: yarn nodemon -e scss,sass -x "yarn lint:sass & yarn build:sass:all"
scripts.build-win:sass:development: yarn lint-win:sass && yarn node-sass %INIT_CWD%/includes/css/scss/development.scss --output %INIT_CWD%/includes/css/ --source-map-embed --source-map-contents && yarn run prefix-win:sass
scripts.build-win:sass:production: yarn node-sass %INIT_CWD%/includes/css/scss/production.scss --output %INIT_CWD%/includes/css/ && yarn run prefix-win:sass:production && yarn minify-win:sass
scripts.watch-win:sass: yarn nodemon -e scss,sass -x "yarn lint-win:sass & yarn build-win:sass:all"
